channel.title: git on Just a Memo
channel.description: Recent content in git on Just a Memo

item.title: Git
item.description: Use Git 删除branch git push origin --delete gh-pages # 删除远程库中的分支gh-pages git branch -D gh-pages # 删除本地分支gh-pages 不同的git client出现冲突，无

item.title: Mac Operations
item.description: Mac Operation create bootable mac usb In Application Download High Sierra apps Format usb stick with mac external file system In terminal: $ sudo /Applications/Install\ macOS\ High\ Sierra.app/Contents/Resources/createinstallmedia --volume /Volumes/Untitled --applicationpath /Applications/Install\ macOS\ High\ Sierra.app brew install with proxy export ALL_PROXY=127.0.0.1:8087 brew install chromedriver set HostName set /etc/hosts set hostname sudo scutil --set ComputerName newname sudo scutil --set LocalHostName newname sudo scutil --set HostName newname dscacheutil -flushcache find and replace
